title: One Company Rethinks Diff to Cut Code Review Times
author: David Cassel
description: Is there a "deeper lexicon" that could better condense the way commits are represented? Alloy.dev finds some basic changes can radically cut the number of lines that coders need to review.
cntitle: 一家公司重新思考 Diff 以缩短代码审查时间
cndescription: 是否存在一种更“深层的词汇表”，可以更好地压缩提交的表示方式？Alloy.dev 发现一些基本的变化可以大幅减少程序员需要审查的行数。
